channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I got a rather weird question. I have been running a Battlescape source for quiet some time now. I just recently got into the Delta Source.
Why is it that when you do the run.bat of a delta source, you get the error "java cannot be recognized as an internal or external command"?
This error never comes up in the Battlescape run.bat.... so I was kind of wondering what the problem was?
Thanks :p

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @bode bode
item.description:
@bode wrote:

Alright, I’ll give it a try, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

The batch file in Battlescape most likely uses the direct path of your Java, whereas the Deltascape server will use something like this:

@echo off java server pause

You’ll either need to change ‘java’ in that piece of code to the direct path of your Java (e.g “c:/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe”), or set your environmental variables.
You can get help with setting your environmental variables either here or here.

Read full topic
